td.content: s:40 yo white m says he is having symptoms of Liver 2 x week, mostly during the day. denies any alcohol use denies any smoking o:Height 163 cm, Weight 78.1 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 16, Liver biopsy-FNA Cyto Severe portal inflammation, lymphocytic bridging necrosis, and diffuse hepatocellular damage a:Hepatitis B p:administered Telbivudine - 600 mg once daily, performed Liver biopsy-FNA Cyto, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

td.content: s:white male manicurist aged 40 yrs presents with 10 days history of Liver. Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol he does not smoke o:Height 162 cm, Weight 75.4 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15 a:Hepatitis B p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to internal medicine.

s:male aged 40 Ys with Liver. he has had several such episodes over past 3 years. denies any smoking Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol o:Height 162 cm, Weight 76 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 16 a:Hepatitis B p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Liver biopsy-FNA Cyto.
